roleset.name: impair a physiological regulatory mechanism

example.name: dysregulate-v: with instrument
example.text: E1A expression dysregulates IL-8 production and suppresses IL-6 production by lung epithelial cells.

example.name: dysregulate-v: with all arguments
example.text: To determine whether a more physiological level of RipA could be converted to a lethal autolysin, we dysregulated RipA activity through the use of the beta-lactam antibiotic meropenem.
example.arg: To determine whether a more physiological level of RipA could be converted to a lethal autolysin,
through the use of the beta-lactam antibiotic meropenem.

example.name: dysregulation-n
example.text: Addiction is presented as a cycle of spiralling dysregulation of brain reward systems

roleset.note: DYSREGULATE-V NOTES: Created for Bio-AMR annotations.
